main event: Observers in Clovis, New Mexico reported a fireball sighting on December 28, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as a reddish-orange fireball,It was observed disappearing gradually while traveling in a straight line,Clear weather conditions allowed for good visibility during the sighting,Multiple witnesses reported seeing the object simultaneously,The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds.
witness description: Various witnesses including an insurance adjuster and a housewife in the area
